entry.title: Mike the Knight’s Dad
entry.summary: In Mike the Knight, Mike’s father, the King, is often referenced but never seen. He is off fighting in some crusades or something. If they ever do introduce him for a Christmas special or somesuch, then I do so hope they manage to get Brian Blessed to voice him.
entry.content:
In Mike the Knight, Mike’s father, the King, is often referenced but never seen. He is off fighting in some crusades or something.

If they ever do introduce him for a Christmas special or somesuch, then I do so hope they manage to get Brian Blessed to voice him.
